info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bladen County through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ammon, or 12 miles northeast of Elizabethtown, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Ammon, White Lake and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
